paper.title: A fast and simple randomized parallel algorithm for maximal matching

author.org: Dept. of Computer Science, Inst. of Technology, Israel#TAB#
Dept. of Computer Science, Inst. of Technology, Israel#TAB#

paper.abstract: Abstract A parallel randomized algorithm to find a maximal matching is presented. Its expected running time on a CRCW-PRAM with vbEvb processors in O(logvbEvb). The expected time is independent of the structure of the input graph. This improves the best known deterministic algorithm by a factor of log 2 vbEvb.
